track.caption: A male vocalist sings this energetic pop song. The tempo is fast with piano accompaniment, bright digital drumming, synthesiser arrangements and groovy bass lines. The song is youthful, fresh, catchy, vivacious, upbeat, sprightly and buoyant with a dance groove. This song is a Hip-Hop Pop song.

recsys_turn.message: Fantastic, I'm glad "Sex On The Beach" hit the mark! For another track with that moody, late-night R&B sound, I recommend "Gave Your Love Away" by Majid Jordan. They're excellent at setting that kind of atmospheric R&B vibe you're enjoying.
